title: Superstarch Use in Athletes
content: Athletes are using Superstarch to refuel their bodies. The struggle to refuel bodies is common among all types of athletes, from Heisman Trophy winners to weekend warriors. Superstarch is used to provide steady energy and a carbohydrate source that allows the body to keep burning fat stores. It is taken about an hour prior to workouts and does not upset the stomach. Athletes report feeling stronger at the end of the workout and appreciate its convenience when travelling or short on time. Superstarch has also been beneficial for athletes struggling with weight issues, providing an energy source that keeps them burning body fat while they train.

title: Athletic Training and Injury Prevention
content: The training of athletes focuses on two important principles: speed and injury prevention. The training programs are designed based on an in-depth biomechanic movement analysis, movement screen, and review of past injuries. This information is used to pinpoint imbalances and develop those weaknesses to build a strong, balanced athlete. The philosophy equally emphasizes injury prevention. The aim is to help athletes avoid injuries by delivering the latest and greatest in science and research.

title: Nutrition and Supplements in Athletes
content: Over the course of a career, athletes may try a lot of supplements including whey protein, casein protein, egg protein, branch chain amino acids, glutamine, creatine monohydrate, waxy maize, pre-workout supplements and more. However, there is an emphasis on getting nutrients from food as opposed to using supplements. A high fat, low carb, and sugar-free diet is recommended. Superstarch has become a popular supplement among athletes.

title: Downsides of Superstarch
content: The most common problem with Superstarch is its chalky taste. To overcome this, athletes are advised to make a smoothie with Superstarch, almond butter, heavy cream, almond milk, and ice. Some athletes may not benefit from Superstarch if they do not enjoy the taste or do not give it a chance because they do not feel an immediate effect.

title: Importance of Informed Decisions on Sports Nutrition Products
content: It is important for athletes and parents of youth athletes to have the best information possible to make an informed decision about what sports nutrition products they use. Some products have incredible marketing, but it is important to educate parents on the truth behind these products. The benefits of no GI distress from Superstarch can be a selling point for many athletes.

title: Benefits of Timed Meals
content: The benefits include convenience for people who donâ€™t have the luxury of being able to time their meals with meetings, the fact that it will keep them burning fat and not spike insulin levels, and providing a steady carbohydrate energy source.
